column1: Uchi////Naturally when at a sushi place
column3: comparisons are made with what you've had before. So I think about Sugarfish and Nobu in the Los Angeles area
column4: the only two places that could be comparable to Uchi... and let me tell you -- Uchi wins. In overall creativity of dishes
column7: there is no comparison. (But I will admit that the sashimi wasn't up to par as other places in California but every other piece of sushi blew it out of the water... haha.. water
